author: hwright
msg: On Windows, don't error on access denied errors when creating a tempfile;
instead just retry creating a tempfile with a new name.
r36442 is the fix and r36443 updates a comment just below the fix.
This bug just showed up on our corporate SVN server when a post-commit

author: hwright
msg: Fixes to build Subversion RPM trunk (1.7) and 1.6.x for RHEL4.
Trunk (1.7) and 1.6.x RHEL4 RPM won't build without these changes.

msg: Create a 1.5.x backport branch for r36879.
